fr.cnrs.iees.tree

Interface Tree<N extends TreeNode>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MinimalGraph<N>, fr.ens.biologie.generic.Sizeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImmutableTreeImpl

    public interface Tree<N extends TreeNode>
extends MinimalGraph<N>

    A tree, i.e. a graph with a hierarchical structure. Its nodes must implement the TreeNode interface, i.e. have getParent() and getChildren() methods.

    Author:
    Jacques Gignoux - 17 d√©c. 2018

        Returns:

      • findNodesByReference

        java.lang.Iterable<N> findNodesByReference(java.lang.String reference)
        Finds all the nodes matching a reference.
        Parameters:
        reference -
        Returns:
        a read-only list of matching nodes

      • matchesReference

        static boolean matchesReference(TreeNode node,
                                java.lang.String ref)

        Checks that the node passed as argument matches the String reference passed as argument. The reference is a locator referring to at most one node in a tree.

        Parameters:
        node - the node to check
        ref - the String reference
        Returns:
